thread.title: Donald Trump’s State Department Gives Green Light to the Keystone XL Pipeline
thread.title_full: Donald Trump’s State Department Gives Green Light to the Keystone XL Pipeline

author: Penny Starr
title: Donald Trump’s State Department Gives Green Light to the Keystone XL Pipeline
text: In this Feb. 24, 2015, file photo, Danny Ruthenberg-Marshall, left, with 350 DC, and Lindsey Halvorson, a student at American University, pick up their signs after attending gathering with other opponents of Keystone XL oil pipeline in support of a veto of the legislation outside the White House in Washington. An Associated Press review of every cross-border pipeline application since 2004 shows that the Keystone review has been anything but ordinary. The company hoping to build Keystone has been waiting for a decision for nearly 7 years — or more than five times the average. (AP Photo/Jacquelyn Martin, File)
